Folsom.Rolling Hills Christian Church:
Rolling Hills Christian Church (or simply Roll Hill Church) is a non-denominational, Evangelical Christian located in El Dorado Hills, CA. It was founded on Easter, 1995 by Jeff Bigelow, who is currently retired. The church has two weekend services averaging around 2,400 attendees.


== Student Ministry ==
Rolling Hills Church boasts one of the largest Student Ministries in Northern California.
